comment: Primary Key for the SPECIMEN table

description: The person from whom the specimen is collected.
The standard CONCEPT_ID that the SPECIMEN_SOURCE_VALUE maps to in the specimen domain.
Put the source of the specimen record, as in an EHR system.
The date the specimen was collected.

comment: Datetime the specimen was collected, if available.

description: The amount of specimen collected from the person.
The unit for the quantity of the specimen.
This is the site on the body where the specimen is from.
This is the identifier for the specimen from the source system.

comment: Verbatim source value for the specimen.

description: This unit for the quantity of the specimen, as represented in the source.
comment: Source value for the unit of quantity.

description: This is the site on the body where the specimen was taken from, as represented in the source.
comment: Source value for the anatomic site of the specimen.
Source value for the disease status.
